creator: kumarp@in.ibm.com
text:
My test plan has dozens of HTTP and SOAP/XML-RPC Samplers. I would like to 
disable/activate several of these samplers at a time (using SHIFT key and 
selecting the samplers and then right clicking the mouse to enable/disable 
samplers). However this feature does not seem to be working and I am forced to 
do it on by one.

Any pointers as to how/when this bug will be fixed?

Thanks in advance!
regards,
Praveen

creator: takeichim@nttdata.co.jp
text:
I made a patch for the above problem.

This will enable us to change Disable/Enable attributes
of current selected nodes all at once.

regards,

Created attachment 12070
patch file for EnableComponent (nightly build)
creator: takeichim@nttdata.co.jp
kumarp@in.ibm.com
text:
Masashi,
I tested the fix and it works! Thanks for the help!

regards,
Praveen

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
[Best not to mark bugs as fixed until the code changes have been applied, or
they might never be picked up again ...]

Code change has been made in HEAD and 2.0 release branch.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text: *** Bug 31337 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
